data.event: On December 13, 2004, residents voted to adopt a charter changing the status of the village into a city form of government.
Douglas, originally known as Dudleyville, was first settled in 1851 as a lumber mill town.
In 1861, residents changed the name to Douglas.

event.title: was incorporated as a village in 1870

data.event: Douglas was incorporated as a village in 1870.
